name: Mana Chess
description:
Mana Chess is a colorful, turn-based adventure with Roguelite progression.
Early Access players will traverse three unique areas, across 10 stages - collecting their choice of randomly offered abilities and items.

Manage your resources efficiently to clear stages in as few turns as possible, and earn rewards.
Keep an eye on your health and gold, and create a balanced fighting style to reach your rival in a distant land.

Master the tactics of your foes by conquering the many versions of each area.
